Hidden WaterHole.Name: Hidden WaterHole
Hidden WaterHole.SpaceQuestion: You've found a hidden water hole deep in the forest, and you notice that animals come here to drink. However, there's some trash around the water. What should you do to help protect this water source?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Leave the trash as it is so you don't disturb the area.
Clean up the trash to keep the water safe for animals.
Add more signs to show other people where the water hole is located.

The Trees.Name: The Trees
The Trees.SpaceQuestion: While exploring the forest, you notice that many trees have been cut down, and the ground is bare. What is the best action to help restore this part of the forest?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Plant new trees to replace the ones that were cut down.
Build a road through the forest for easier access.
Clear more land to make space for new buildings.

Forgotten Path.Name: Forgotten Path
Forgotten Path.SpaceQuestion: As you walk along the forgotten path, you notice fewer animals and hear less birdsong than usual. Why might animals be disappearing from this area of the forest?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Deforestation is destroying their homes, leaving them with nowhere to live and find food.
The animals are migrating to other forests for a change of scenery.
Animals are becoming less active during the day because they prefer cooler temperatures.

Distant Horizon.Name: Distant Horizon
Distant Horizon.SpaceQuestion: From the distant horizon, you spot a deer limping near a dry riverbed. It seems to be searching for water. What can you do to help animals like this deer survive in a changing environment?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Try to guide the deer toward the nearest town for help.
Feed the deer some food you have with you to help it regain strength.
Support efforts to restore water sources, so animals have a place to drink.

Shallow Waters.Name: Shallow Waters
Shallow Waters.SpaceQuestion: You have found a fish tangled in a plastic bag. What will you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Untangle the fish
Ignore it
Kill the fish

Sea Turtle NestingSite.Name: Sea Turtle NestingSite
Sea Turtle NestingSite.SpaceQuestion: You stumbled upon a sea turtle laying its eggs. What will you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Get close and take some photos
Ignore it
Try to help it

Seagull NestingArea.Name: Seagull NestingArea
Seagull NestingArea.SpaceQuestion: You see a flock of seagulls eating some trash by the trashcan. What will you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Attack them
Scare them away and throw the trash in the bin
Ignore it

TidePools.Name: TidePools
TidePools.SpaceQuestion: You step into a tide pool. What will you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Do it again
Be upset for weeks
Make sure to be more aware next time

The Barn.Name: The Barn
The Barn.SpaceDescription: A cozy barn filled with livestock and tools for farming.
The Barn.SpaceQuestion: You notice some cows looking unwell. What should you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Provide fresh water and call a vet.
Ignore the cows; they will recover on their own.
Sell the cows to avoid extra costs.

Pond.Name: Pond
Pond.SpaceDescription: A small pond providing water for animals and crops.
Pond.SpaceQuestion: The pond is polluted with trash. What will you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Add more water to dilute the pollution.
Ignore it; nature will fix itself.
Clean the pond and add plants to filter the water.

Crop Field.Name: Crop Field
Crop Field.SpaceDescription: A field used for growing crops, but the soil looks dry and cracked.
Crop Field.SpaceQuestion: What is the best method to restore soil health?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Use chemical fertilizers.
Add compost and practice crop rotation.
Leave the soil as it is.

The Stable.Name: The Stable
The Stable.SpaceDescription: A stable for horses and other animals. It's peaceful, but something needs attention.
The Stable.SpaceQuestion: The stable floor is dirty, and the animals seem uncomfortable. What will you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Clean the floor and add fresh bedding.
Leave it; the animals will manage.
Move the animals outside permanently.

HighWay.Name: HighWay
HighWay.SpaceQuestion: You are on the Highway and see 3 big bags of plastic on the side of the road. What do you do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: Stop up in a safe manner and pick it up
You stop up and add another bag of trash on the pile

Park.Name: Park
Park.SpaceQuestion:
You now spot plastic straws from people who've had milkshakes.
 What's the right thing to do?

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: You pick them up and throw them in the trash

SpaceAnswerChoices.Asnwer: Picking up 3 straws won't make a difference, so you leave it

SpaceAnswerChoices.Answer: You simply take another route. The sight of trash in the nature ruins your walk

BikeLane.Name: BikeLane
BikeLane.SpaceQuestion: You're on your way to school and see shards of glass on the lane. What do you do?

SpaceAnswerQuestions.Answer: You prioritize your deck and bike as much around it as possible
You put it to the side and contact the authorities

Alley.Name: Alley
Alley.SpaceQuestion:
You see an open trash bag on a windy day. Not only is it attracting rats, but the plastic also flies out.
 What do you do?

SpaceAnswerQuestions.Answer: You cover your nose with your hand and say "Whats that foul smell?!"
You ignore it since you don't want trash juice on you
You try to clean up what you can
